Text: Morrill Anti-Bigamy Act:  Sponsored by Justin Smith Morrill of Vermont, the act banned bigamy in federal territories such as Utah and limited church and non-profit ownership in any territory of the United States to $50,000.

Triplets:<Justin Smith Morrill
